text: RAW 264.7 cells were seeded in 12-well plates in RPMI medium containing 5 % FBS one day prior to transfection , Secreted alkaline phosphatase ( SEAP ) reporter plasmids pTAL-SEAP or pNF-kappaB-SEAP were transfected into cells using Qiagene Effectene or Attractene transfection kit ( Qiagen , Valencia , CA ) according to the manufacturer 's protocol .

For co-transfection studies , <extra_id_0> PKCalpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or NF-kappaB <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> constructs were mixed at a ratio of 5 : 1 with the reporter plasmid .
event: <extra_id_0> <extra_id_0> Gene_expression co-transfection <extra_id_0> Theme PKCalpha <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1> <extra_id_0> Gene_expression co-transfection <extra_id_0> Theme p65 <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1> <extra_id_1>

text: For siRNA transfection , 100 nM of <extra_id_0> PKCalpha siRNA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or control siRNA were used .
Cells were incubated with the transfection reagents for 16-24 hours , washed and starved in RPMI without FBS for 4 hours .
Samples were then stimulated with 100 ng / ml M-CSF for 4 hours at which point the medium was collected for the SEAP analysis .
For inhibition studies , cells were pre-incubated with inhibitors for 30 minutes before M-CSF treatment .
On average , we realized 30-40 % transfection efficiency as confirmed by <extra_id_0> GFP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression in Raw 264.7 cells .
